title: Handling an Angry Customer
description: Practice de-escalating a situation with an upset customer
scenario: A customer calls in very upset because their internet service has been down for 3 days. They are threatening to cancel their service and leave negative reviews. They are raising their voice and using harsh language.

title: Product Return Process
description: Guide a customer through the return process
scenario: A customer wants to return a product they purchased online 10 days ago. The product doesn't match the description on the website. They have the original packaging and receipt.
keyPoints: Offer return label or shipping options

title: Technical Support - Password Reset
description: Help a customer reset their account password
scenario: A customer is locked out of their account after multiple failed login attempts. They cannot remember their password and don't have access to the recovery email address.

title: Upselling Additional Services
scenario: A customer calls to ask about their current plan. They mention they're working from home now and need better internet speed. They seem satisfied with your service but are concerned about costs.

title: Billing Dispute Resolution
description: Handle a customer disputing charges on their bill
scenario: A customer received a bill that is $50 higher than usual. They claim they didn't use any additional services and believe there's an error. They're asking for an immediate refund and threatening to escalate to management.

title: New Customer Onboarding
description: Welcome and set up a new customer account
scenario: A new customer has just signed up for your service and is calling for help with initial setup. They're not very tech-savvy and seem overwhelmed by the process.
